description: This file defines a utility object 'SplitUtils' that provides functionality to split a string into tokens based on spaces and stores these tokens in a LinkedList.

classes.name: SplitUtils
classes.description: A utility singleton object providing string splitting functions.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits the input string into tokens based on spaces and stores them in a LinkedList.

methods.name: addIfValid
methods.description: Adds the token to the list if it is not empty.

methods.name: isTokenValid
methods.description: Checks if a token is non-empty.
